title: DataProductPortsView
description: Combined view of input and output ports for a data product, optimized for lineage-like visualization with independent pagination for each port type. Returns full entity details for each port.

paginatedEntities.description: A paginated list of full entity objects with total count

data.description: List of full entity objects in the current page

paging.description: Pagination information including offset and total count

entity.description: Reference to the data product entity

inputPorts.description: Paginated list of input ports - full entity details of data assets consumed by this data product

outputPorts.description: Paginated list of output ports - full entity details of data assets produced/exposed by this data product
